products.title: Gingko Dove Grey Roman Blind
products.description: The ginko dove grey roman blind is an exquisitely delicate embroidered pattern in a stylish grey which will look great whichever room you prefer. Use it as a legitimate feature across tall, ornate windows in lounges down to accentuating a smaller window on a staircase. The fabric will fall in careless folds without creasing further emphasising the softness of this embroidered blind. products.title: Fabio Cream Roman Blind
products.description: The fabio roman blind in a natural cream flawlessly ties the outside with your interior. Weve added interest by looping through metallics and textures, but the effect is subtle so while you have a clean, warm, pattern, it wont overwhelm your room. The colourway will tone down bright lounges or enhance plain halls, making these blinds an investment in your future. products.title: Fabio Dove Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Bring the outside in, with textured flowers, leaves and trees which blend with earthy tones to tie any room together. Woven with subtle metallics to lift the pattern and boost interest without overpowering the rest of your home. Youll find the fabio dove grey roman blind a splendid addition to your living room, entrances and particularly soothing for bedrooms. products.title: Dragonfly Ochre Yellow Roman Blind
products.description: If youre a nature lover, then you will adore this dragonfly ochre yellow roman blind. Dragon-flies are traditionally sketched to adorn a warm ochre backdrop, truly transporting the outside in. Perfect for any room, you could enjoy this fine linen mix blind as easily in a childrens playroom as you could an opulent dining space. Whatever your choice, you can be confident that selecting this yellow ochre roman blind will produce an outstanding focal point.

products.title: Dragonfly Mineral Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Bring nature into your home with the azure mineral blue roman blind. The serious deep tones of this linen mix blind are balanced with a buoyant sketch of dragonflies to add the perfect dynamic to your home. Weve prepared the blind from a delicious weave of cotton and linen so its suitable for wherever you choose to hang it. products.title: Dragonfly Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Pull out the tender greens of the hand sketched dragonflies on the dragonfly roman blind by pairing it against strong surfaces. Or add a dash of humour to a serious space such as an office or bathroom. This incredibly versatile blind is further enhanced because weve invested in a deluxe blend of cotton and linen meaning that the fabric breathes so you can confidently hang it throughout your home.

products.title: Dragonfly Aqua Roman Blind
products.description: Traditional hand drawn dragonflies adorn the azure roman blind in aqua blue for a taste of pastoral charm.
